channel.title: CVE Feed for Tribulant -- Newsletters
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tribulant -- Newsletters

item.title: CVE-2024-37227|2024-06-21T13:40:52.608Z -- tribulant -- newsletters
item.description: Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Tribulant Newsletters.This issue affects Newsletters: from n/a through 4.9.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-35718|2024-06-10T15:13:52.956Z -- tribulant -- newsletters
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Tribulant Newsletters allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Newsletters: from n/a through 4.9.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-32954|2024-06-04T17:50:03.870Z -- tribulant -- newsletters
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in Tribulant Newsletters.This issue affects Newsletters: from n/a through 4.9.5.
